articles.title: American Airlines mechanic pleads guilty to sabotaging plane in Miami: reports
articles.description: A California mechanic who worked for American Airlines for more than 30 years has pleaded guilty to tampering with an aircraft in a deal to avoid a maximum sentence of 20 years in prison, according to reports.
articles.content:
A California mechanic who worked for American Airlines for more than 30 years has pleaded guilty to tampering with an aircraft in a deal to avoid a maximum sentence of 20 years in prison, according to reports.

articles.author: Andrew Napolitano
articles.title: Judge Andrew Napolitano: Impeachment needed for Trump – He tried to unlawfully put his needs above nation’s
articles.description: Everyone who believes in the rule of law should be terrified of a president who thinks and behaves as if it does not apply to him.
